field.name: access-slideshow_slideshow-width
field.label: Slideshow Width (px or %)
field.description: Enter width of slideshow. You can enter in px (for example 100px) or in % (for example 80%). Default value is 100%: it will adapt to the container's width.

field.name: access-slideshow_slideshow-height
field.label: Slideshow Height (px)
field.description: Height of the slideshow (for example write '100px'). If the value is 'auto' then the slideshow will adapt to the height of the images.

field.name: access-slideshow_text-container-height
field.label: Text container height (in px)
field.description: Height of the text container (for example write '100px'). If the value is 'auto' then the container will adapt to the height of the text.

field.name: access-slideshow_text-over-images
field.label: Text over images?
field.description: If false, the title and the description will NOT be printed over the image

field.name: access-slideshow_animation-interval
field.label: Animation Interval
field.description: Enter the time (in milliseconds) between each slide

field.name: access-slideshow_animation-speed
field.label: Animation Speed
field.description: Enter the time (in milliseconds) for the slide animation

field.name: access-slideshow_linked-titles
field.label: Enable linked titles?
field.description: If a link is set, the title and the image will have the same link.

field.name: access-slideshow_fully-responsive-image
field.label: Fully responsive images?
field.description: If true, the images will ALWAYS adapt to the container. If false, the image will scale down ONLY.

field.name: access-slideshow_slideshow-heading_is-enabled
field.label: Enable an hidden slideshow heading?
field.description: This heading describes the slideshow. It will be visible only to screen readers.

field.name: access-slideshow_slideshow-heading_level
field.label: Hidden heading level?
field.description: Select the heading level for the hidden heading

field.name: access-slideshow_slides-heading_level
field.label: Slides title level?
field.description: Select the heading level of each slide title

field.name: access-slideshow_titles-font-size
field.label: Titles font size (px or em)
field.description: Write for example: 12px or 1.2em

field.name: access-slideshow_description-font-size
field.label: Descriptions font size (px or em)
field.description: Write for example: 10px or 1em

field.name:
*IMPORTANT:
To define a new slide you need to:
- Define an image path
- Define a title
access-slideshow_slide-1-image-path
field.label: Slide 1 image path*
field.description: Load here your image

field.name: access-slideshow_slide-1-image-alt
field.label: ALT attribute
field.description: This attribute is important for the screenreaders, give a description of the image here or write any important content contained in the image.

field.name: access-slideshow_slide-1-text-visible
field.label: Show the slide text? (title and description)
field.description: If set to false, the title and the description will be hidden (but visible to screen reader users)

field.name: access-slideshow_slide-1-description
field.label: Slide 1 description
field.description: Enter a text here. Note that you can also add HTML code

field.name: access-slideshow_slide-1-link
field.label: Slide 1 link
field.description: Write here the slide link (for example http://www.google.it)
